channel.title: Coding on Liberatys - Nick
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Liberatys - Nick

item.title: Why [Neovim|Vim] might not be my forever editor
item.description: A relationship with an expiration date? I’ve been using Neovim(and Vim before that) for about three years now. A teacher of mine told me to play the vim adventure game so that I had something to do in class. It was not love at first sight. And for many reasons: There were no fancy images / emojis No refactoring tools It was running on the terminal Strange keybindings Modes? Why can’t I just insert characters in normal mode?
